project.name: SUSE
project.author: tampakrap
project.description: The Gentoo SUSE project maintains (open)SUSE related technologies

longdescription.p: The Gentoo SUSE project is the official Gentoo project for the maintenance and development of SUSE related products, like the Open Build Service. Apart from that, the project members will try to make the SUSE technologies Gentoo-compatible. The team consists of Gentoo developers who are also SUSE employees, but everyone is welcome to join.

goals.p: The goal is to provide ebuilds for the various SUSE technologies, plus to push patches upstream in order to make those products Gentoo-compatible.
